Reviews.Title: Just Ok laptop, in that price you can find better deals
Reviews.Author: IRONMAN
Reviews.Content: 1. This is not touchscreen2. There is no space between two USB ports, I cannot plug in two flash drives at same time.3. Touchpad is problem sometimes4. No mic jack, only headphone5. Boots fast (good point)6. Over all not in my wish list if i buy another 3/5 (Average laptop)

Reviews.Title: Known problem with space bar
Reviews.Author: Manhwell
Reviews.Content: There is a known problem with the spacebar. Just google ASUS X550CA space bar problem and you'll see. Now I have to contact Amazonor Asus to fix this.

Reviews.Title: ASUS X550CA-DB71 15.6-Inch Laptop
Reviews.Author: Yasodra Parbhoo
Reviews.Content: Awesome Laptop... im now thinking about investing in a second one.... This Item is worth getting you won't regret it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent fast computer
Reviews.Author: StevenW
Reviews.Content: This is a lightning fast computer that you can not go wrong with. I have not experienced the same problem as the other reviewer with the space bar issue and I have to say I could not be happier with this product.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i7-3537U 2.0GHz
8 GB SO-DIMM
1000 GB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
15.6-Inch Screen
Windows 8
ProductInfo.Name: ASUS X550CA-DB71 15.6-Inch Laptop
